Played this game a little. And here are the things that got exchanged.
Things i gave Counter-Strike:
1. Money
2. Time
3. Recommendations
4. Bought Counter-Strike for Friends
5. Love
6. Valve Reviews

Things Counter-Strike gave me in return:
1. Friends Rage
2. Lost my Friend
2. Arthritis
3. Server Rage
4. Hatred from Brazilians, Spanish and Americans
5. Broken Keyboards
6. Broken Mouse
7. Fried graphics card
8. server crashes
9. Retard Teammates
10. Competitive matches with bots on my team
11. "Noob, you suck, easy-pizzy lemon squeezy" spam
12. "Hacker, Wall, im going to report you" If you kill anyone before they kill you
13. Learned Spanish and portuguese from the Multilingual cursing
14. lag
15. Cheaters
16. Little kids under the age of 12 telling me they banged my mom
17. Being kicked because trolls kept jumping in front of my AWP shot

Essentially - CS GO did me more Bad than Good. But i Love her and Ill stick to it

10/10 Would recommend the game!

С каждым обновлением игра становится требовательнее и требовательнее. Если в одно время имеешь 120-130, то через годик другой станет в два раза меньше. Грустная история для пользователей со слабым железом((. Как же в такой ситуации поднимать глобала
